name: LibraryThing Home Single Row Recently Added
description: Makes the Home page show a single row of recently added books, cutting off those that fit outside the row.

user.name: brightcopy
user.about: Feel free to drop a message on my LibraryThing profile.  If you have a request for a style, I'd be happy to consider it.

additional_info: The code given assumes small thumbnails, which are 62px after margins are added.  Medium covers use 102px and large covers use 132px.  For more rows, multiply the height by the number of rows.
